answers.answer: DO YOU HAVE A OVER BITE OR YOUR TONGUE MAY NEED TO BE CLIPPED

Did you ever find a cure for your excess saliva problem. I have the same problem  and it's upsetting to me as I see everyone wiping off their face when I talk to them.  I have had this problem for the last 10 years.  please help.  I do have type 2 diabetes and b vitamin deficiency.
